resources.string: Please select your answer for each of the questions. In the 6th question, select more than one option, and in the 7th question, please write your answer. When done, click the Submit button!
At what age did Vera Wang decide to change her career into an independent bridal wear designer?
At what age did Charles Darwin publish his theory of evolution in his book "On the Origin of Species"?
At what age did Reid Hoffman co-founded LinkedIn?
At what age did Fauja Sing run his first marathon?
Around what age did Edmond Hoyle begin to write down the rules of various card games?
At age of 35, what were the professions of Harrison Ford?
What is the name of a famous chicken restaurant franchise, started by Colonel Sanders in the age of 62?
Click \"Submit\" button to see your results!
